Persamaan dari interpolasi adalah
P(x) = 7.187066071661201E12 + (-9.346993079173438E12x^1) + 5.334203055240578E12x^2 + (-1.7568101863613564E12x^3) + 3.68550807175535E11x^4 + (-5.113187676013281E10x^5) + 4.695806315428793E9x^6 + (-2.7547453942066944E8x^7) + 9372849.23910132x^8 + (-140993.71224863594x^9) 
P(7.516) = 53566.80859375
